section.title: Global Conversion Ratio
section.para: Global conversion ratios enable you to create basic conversions such as inches to feet, pounds to ounces, etc. Once defined here, these conversions may be used throughout the system. The master list of global conversion ratios should include conversions both from and to the specified Unit of Measure. That is to say, if the conversion from ounces to pounds is defined in the maintenance for pounds, the calculated conversion from pounds to ounces should also appear in the ounces maintenance. Users can add, edit and delete from the list of conversions. However, users should be discouraged from editing or changing a conversion ratio that is being or has been used in a transaction.
To create a new global conversion ratio, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:

note.para: As their name implies, global conversion ratios may be used throughout the system once they are defined in the UOM Master Information.

section.para: When creating a new global conversion ratio, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select a source Unit of Measure from the list of defined Units of Measure.
Enter a value for the source Unit of Meaure to be used in the conversion ratio.
Select a per Unit of Measure from the list of defined Units of Measure.
Enter a value for the per Unit of Meaure to be used in the conversion ratio.

Specify whether Inventory processed using this alternate Unit of Measure may be maintained in fractional quantities. If not selected, Inventory using this global conversion ratio may not be maintained in fractional quantities.
